author: Alessio Pieruccetti

comments.comment: Argues that it is easy to debug and find bad commits when you rebase; even recognizing that merge commits are the starting point to find the bad commit.
Author prefers solving conflicts through rebase command, which would resolve conflicts commit by commit rather than in a large merge commit.

description: A counter to an article saying git rebase should never be used.

title: Advantages of Git Rebase
